content: Which American rock band released the hit songs "Hotel California" and "Take It Easy"?

That would be the Eagles, one of the most successful American rock bands of all time. "Hotel California" is arguably their most famous song, and "Take It Easy" is another classic that's been covered by many artists over the years. The Eagles are known for their smooth harmonies andblend of rock, country, and pop influences. They were inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in 1998.
